title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 point(s) maximum

Description (1 point each; 2 points maximum)

Genetic makeup

• Increase genetic diversity

• Introduce new alleles

• Introduce new protein/amino acid

Evolution

• Mutant/new phenotypes are subject to natural selection

• Mutation is subject to evolutionary forces
